settings.text: *BLACK FRIDAY SALE* - 20% and more  OFF HUGE RANGE

settings.section_textblock:
HUGE Savings Across All Our Ranges - 20% off nearly ALL products, excluding our fantastic value 3 for 2 bundles.

Perfect for Gifting this Christmas.
Our Curated Selection of Gifts perfect for Mum, Dad, Aunts & Uncles!

Designs Chosen with Experts in Aged Care so can can be confident in getting the best fabrics and designs for your loved ones

Its the carers that get most excited by this range!

Easy to dress, Easy to wear, Easy to Love for any Adult
Large Displays. Key Functionality combined with Ease of Use.

settings.heading: Convenient
settings.description: All our products can be sent directly to your loved one's home or nursing home wrapped with love and a bow.

settings.heading: Carefully Selected
settings.description: Small design details such as larger buttons to aid dexterity challenges, wide necklines to aid dressing, elasticated waist bands for comfort and pump-action dispensers have been considered in our product selection.

settings.heading: Bringing Joy
settings.description: We are passionate about bringing moments of joy with our carefully selected range of products and gifts for modern seniors. If you're stuck for ideas, drop us a message and we'd be happy to help! Niall & Serena x

settings.section_textblock: Soft Materials. Perfect for Layering. Special Offers now available!

settings.section_title: Care Packages & Bundles for Seniors in Care
settings.section_textblock:
Even practical essentials are gifts when needed and thoughtfully sent. Explore our range of important care bundles designed for Seniors in Care.

All orders wrapped with love and bow!

settings.heading: Free Shipping
settings.description: Free Express Delivery when you spend 85 or more to UK, Ireland, France, Germany, Netherlands.

settings.heading: We're here to Help!
settings.description: If you have any questions or need advice on any of our products, use the Live Chat at the bottom of the screen.

settings.heading: Guided by Experts
settings.description: We work with a panel of professionals including Physiotherapists, Occupational therapists, Directors of Nursing in selecting the products for our Seniors.

HIGH-QUALITY & AMAZING SERVICE

"Everything was simply perfect in all aspects: great products, speedy delivery, but above all the first class service provided by Serena, who is super professional and really knows how to make the customers satisfied."
settings.author: Filippo F.

settings.description:
BRILLIANT COMMUNICATION

"I came across this website after searching online for a hard to find product - I happened to send an Instagram message with a question and they replied really quickly. My order came next day! Highly recommend this shop"
settings.author: Catherine Hamilton

settings.description:
LOVE THIS SHOP!

"A unique and more practical alternative to the flowers and chocolates that lets face are just overdone. I have found my new go to for any friends who are in hospital or recovering!"
settings.author: Joanie Hughes Farrelly

settings.description:
AMAZING GIFTS

"I dont normally leave reviews, but the quality of the gifts, the first class service and speed of delivery was amazing!!! I highly recommend A Little & Often and I shall be ordering a lot and often!!!"
settings.author: Ray Hurley
